welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kagithane, Turkey! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this vibrant city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and lively markets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kagithane has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Istanbul Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction and set to open in 2021.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
